ai_analysis.summary: All key fields are consistent and the ML ensemble assigns a very low fraud risk (0.0%), supporting approval of this money order.
reasoning: Numeric amount (USD 450.00) exactly matches the written amount (“FOUR HUNDRED FIFTY AND 00/100 DOLLARS”), avoiding the 45% fraud‐linked amount mismatches seen in the training set.
Issuer “MoneyGram” is valid and serial number 9021056789 conforms to known MoneyGram patterns.
Signature field is present and legible, satisfying mandatory signature requirements.
No ML-identified fraud indicators; Random Forest (4.5%) and XGBoost (4.3%) scores are well below typical escalation thresholds.
New customer with no negative history or similar fraud cases on record.
actionable_recommendations: Verify government-issued ID for payee SARAH CHEN at payout.
Confirm purchaser MICHAEL LEE’s identity if present in person.
Record serial number and transaction details in your logging system.
